Bases: object

KeyValueStoreBase defines a store interface.

delete(category, key)[source]¶

Deletes a key value pair from the store.

@param: category of the key value pair @type: String

@param: key of the key value pair @type: String

exists(category, key)[source]¶

Checks if a key value pair exists in the store.

@param: category of the key value pair @type: String

@param: key of the key value pair @type: String

@return: flag that states if the key value pair exists or not @rtype: Boolean

get(category, key)[source]¶

Gets a key value pair from the store.

@param: category of the key value pair @type: String

@param: key of the key value pair @type: String

@return: value of the key value pair @rtype: Objects

getModifySet(category, key, modfunction, **kwargs)[source]¶

get value give as parameter to modfunction try to set by means of testset, if not succesfull try again, will use random function to maximize chance to set @param kwargs are other parameters as required (see usage in subscriber function)

getNrRecords(incrementtype)[source]¶
increment(incrementtype)[source]¶

@param incrementtype : type of increment is in style machine.disk.nrdisk (dot notation)

incrementReset(incrementtype, newint=0)[source]¶

@param incrementtype : type of increment is in style machine.disk.nrdisk (dot notation)

list(category, prefix)[source]¶

Lists the keys matching prefix in category.

@param category: category the keys should be in @type category: String @param prefix: prefix the keys should start with @type prefix: String @return: keys that match prefix in category. @rtype: List(String)

listCategories()[source]¶

Lists the categories in this db.

@return: categories in this db @rtype: List(String)

lock(locktype, info='', timeout=5, timeoutwait=0, force=False)[source]¶

if locked will wait for time specified @param locktype of lock is in style machine.disk.import (dot notation) @param timeout is the time we want our lock to last @param timeoutwait wait till lock becomes free @param info is info which will be kept in lock, can be handy to e.g. mention why lock taken @param force, if force will erase lock when timeout is reached @return None

lockCheck(locktype)[source]¶

@param locktype of lock is in style machine.disk.import (dot notation) @return result,id,lockEnd,info (lockEnd is time when lock times out, info is descr of lock, id is who locked)

result is False when free, True when lock is active
now()[source]¶

return current time (when in appserver will require less time then calling native jumpscale function)

serialize(value)[source]¶
set(category, key, value)[source]¶

Sets a key value pair in the store.

@param: category of the key value pair @type: String

@param: key of the key value pair @type: String

settest(category, key, value)[source]¶

if well stored return True

subscribe(subscriberid, category, startid=0)[source]¶

each subscriber is identified by a key in db there is a dict stored on key for category = category of this method value= dict with as keys the subscribers {“kristof”:[lastaccessedTime,lastId],”pol”:...}

subscriptionAdvance(subscriberid, category, lastProcessedId)[source]¶
subscriptionGetNextItem(subscriberid, category, autoConfirm=True)[source]¶

get next item from subscription returns

False,None when no next True,the data when a next
unlock(locktype, timeoutwait=0, force=False)[source]¶

@param locktype of lock is in style machine.disk.import (dot notation)

JumpScale.baselib.key_value_store.store_factory module¶

class JumpScale.baselib.key_value_store.store_factory.KeyValueStoreFactory[source]¶

Bases: object

The key value store factory provides logic to retrieve store instances. It also caches the stores based on their type, name and namespace.

getArakoonStore(namespace='', serializers=[])[source]¶

Gets an Arakoon key value store.

@param namespace: namespace of the store, defaults to None @type namespace: String

@param defaultJSModelSerializer: default JSModel serializer @type defaultJSModelSerializer: Object

@return: key value store @rtype: ArakoonKeyValueStore

getFileSystemStore(namespace='', baseDir=None, serializers=[])[source]¶

Gets a file system key value store.

@param namespace: namespace of the store, defaults to an empty string @type namespace: String

@param baseDir: base directory of the store, defaults to j.dirs.db @type namespace: String

@param defaultJSModelSerializer: default JSModel serializer @type defaultJSModelSerializer: Object

@return: key value store @rtype: FileSystemKeyValueStore

getLevelDBStore(namespace='', basedir=None, serializers=[])[source]¶

Gets a leveldb key value store.

@param name: name of the store @type name: String

@param namespace: namespace of the store, defaults to ‘’ @type namespace: String

@return: key value store

getMemoryStore(namespace=None)[source]¶

Gets a memory key value store.

@return: key value store @rtype: MemoryKeyValueStore

@return: key value store @rtype: MemoryKeyValueStore
